shortdesc.ph: Information about shareable windows or screens.
Information about shareable windows or screens.
Information about shareable windows or screens.

plentry.pd: Type of the sharing target. See .
For windows, indicates the Window ID; for screens, indicates the Display ID.
Name of the window or screen. UTF-8 encoded.
Image content of the thumbnail. See .
Image content of the icon. See .
Process to which the window belongs. UTF-8 encoded.
Window title. UTF-8 encoded.

Whether the screen is the primary display:
: The screen is the primary display.
: The screen is not the primary display.
Position of the window relative to the entire screen space (including all shareable screens). See .

(Windows only) Whether the window is minimized:
: The window is minimized.
: The window is not minimized.

(Windows only) ID of the screen where the window is located. If the window spans multiple screens, it refers to the screen with the largest intersecting area. If the window is outside the visible screen, the value is -2.
Type of the sharing target. See .
For windows, represents the Window ID; for screens, represents the Display ID.
Name of the window or screen. UTF-8 encoded.
Image content of the thumbnail. See .
Image content of the icon. See .
Process to which the window belongs. UTF-8 encoded.
Window title. UTF-8 encoded.

Whether the screen is the primary display:
: The screen is the primary display.
: The screen is not the primary display.
Position of the window relative to the entire screen space (including all shareable screens). See .

(Windows only) Whether the window is minimized:
: The window is minimized.
: The window is not minimized.

(Windows only) ID of the screen where the window is located. If the window spans multiple screens, this indicates the screen with the largest intersection area. If the window is outside the visible screen area, the value is -2.
Type of the sharing target. See .
For a window, this is the Window ID; for a screen, this is the Display ID.
Name of the window or screen. UTF-8 encoded.
Image content of the thumbnail. See .
Image content of the icon. See .
Process to which the window belongs. UTF-8 encoded.
Window title. UTF-8 encoded.

Whether the screen is the primary display:
: The screen is the primary display.
: The screen is not the primary display.
Position of the window relative to the entire screen space (including all shareable screens). See .

(Windows only) ID of the screen where the window is located. If the window spans multiple screens, this is the ID of the screen with the largest intersection area. If the window is outside the visible screen area, the value is -2.
